      • createPath

        public InodeTree.CreatePathResult createPath(TachyonURI path,
                                    CreatePathOptions options)
                                      throws FileAlreadyExistsException,
                                             BlockInfoException,
                                             InvalidPathException,
                                             IOException
        Creates a file or directory at path.
        Parameters:
        path - the path
        options - method options
        Returns:
        a InodeTree.CreatePathResult representing the modified inodes and created inodes during path creation
        Throws:
        FileAlreadyExistsException - when there is already a file at path if we want to create a directory there
        BlockInfoException - when blockSizeBytes is invalid
        InvalidPathException - when path is invalid, for example, (1) when there is nonexistent necessary parent directories and recursive is false, (2) when one of the necessary parent directories is actually a file
        IOException

      • reinitializeFile

        public long reinitializeFile(TachyonURI path,
                    long blockSizeBytes,
                    long ttl)
                      throws InvalidPathException,
                             IOException
        Reinitializes the block size and TTL of an existing open file.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file
        blockSizeBytes - the new block size
        ttl - the ttl
        Returns:
        the file id
        Throws:
        InvalidPathException - if the paht is invalid
        IOException

      • getInodeChildrenRecursive

        public List<Inode> getInodeChildrenRecursive(InodeDirectory inodeDirectory)
        Returns a list of all descendants of a particular InodeDirectory. Any directory inode precedes its descendants in the list.
        Parameters:
        inodeDirectory - The root InodeDirectory to retrieve all descendants from.
        Returns:
        A list of all descendants

      • setPinned

        public void setPinned(Inode inode,
             boolean pinned,
             long opTimeMs)
        Sets the pinned state of an inode. If the inode is a directory, the pinned state will be set recursively.
        Parameters:
        inode - The Inode to set the pinned state for.
        pinned - The pinned state to set for the inode (and possible descendants).
        opTimeMs - The operation time

      • setPinned

        public void setPinned(Inode inode,
             boolean pinned)
        Sets the pinned state of an inode. If the inode is a directory, the pinned state will be set recursively.
        Parameters:
        inode - The Inode to set the pinned state for.
        pinned - The pinned state to set for the inode (and possible descendants).

      • addInodeFromJournal

        public void addInodeFromJournal(InodeEntry entry)
        Adds the inode represented by the entry parameter into the inode tree. If the inode entry represents the root inode, the tree is "reset", and all state is cleared.
        Parameters:
        entry - The journal entry representing an inode.
